statements: DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE program_id = 1 AND total_donations > 1000;
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Revenue' AND metric_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM volunteer_data WHERE program_id = 2002 AND hours_volunteered > 10;
DELETE FROM volunteer_data WHERE program_id = 200 AND hours_volunteered > 10;
DELETE FROM Beneficiary WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM donation_metrics WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
